text: Ezɨ bizir kɨ ifongezir mam iti, nɨ a damigh. Kɨ Kraisɨn ziamɨn nɨ mɨkemeghtɨma nɨ a damuamin gavgavim iti. Ezɨ kamaghɨn kɨ nɨn arazir aghuibagh fo, nɨ Kraisɨn adarazigh ifongezir arazim gɨfo, eghtɨ kɨ akar gavgavim nɨ danigan kogham. Ezɨ igharaz darazigh ifongezir arazim ga isa uaningɨn suira, kamaghɨn amizɨma kɨ nɨmɨra nɨ mɨkɨmasa. Kɨ Pol, kɨ Krais Iesusɨn abuir gumazim, egha datɨrɨghɨn kɨ a bangɨn kalabusɨn iti.
